title: 05/31/21 DPS Hour 3 Kurt Helin
itunes:title: 05/31/21 DPS Hour 3 Kurt Helin
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker, in for Dan Patrick, look at pivotal moments in the NBA Playoffs, as Anthony Davis gets injured and the Clippers even the series with the Mavericks. NBC Sports NBA Writer Kurt Helin joins the guys to talk Kyrie Irving's contentious return to Boston and the Knicks slipping against the Hawks. Plus, should Naomi Osaka face disqualification for refusing the address the media at the French Open?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
